Title: John From
Actors: Julia Palha, Clara Riedenstein, Filipe Vargas, Adriano Luz
Plot: Bored by spending the summer in the city, 15-year-old Rita decides to take a fancy to her new neighbor, a photographer who is setting up an exhibit of his shots in Melanesia. What starts as a game turns into a blazing crush and Rita can't distinguish between reality and fantasy anymore.
